document_name: Disaster Risk Reduction ProDoc Guyana Dec 2009.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Volunteers are a critical component of disaster response and preparedness. The project will leverage and develop volunteer capacities, as well as promote volunteerism to engage and mobilise community members in grassroots disaster risk management efforts. Risk and vulnerability assessments and community-based disaster management planning will effectively rely on the participation of volunteers in these processes and the sustainability of a disaster management system at local level.

project_descr: Strengthening National &  Local Capacities fo Disaster Response & Risk Reduction
project_title: Capacity Building for Disaster Risk Reduction
